content.query:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- E.  CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL and EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE (SAS)
--     Replace <YOUR_SAS_TOKEN_WITHOUT_QUESTIONMARK> with the SAS token string (no leading ?)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL adls_sas_cred
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = 'sp=r&st=2025-12-11T15:32:14Z&se=2025-12-11T23:47:14Z&spr=https&sv=2024-11-04&sr=c&sig=jlAKX7rPuynOUCmG1kl7ogqKhswts1HHR7mim5%2FC4aE%3D';
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE team1_bank_raw_data_adls
WITH (
    TYPE = HADOOP,
    LOCATION = 'abfss://test1-bank-data-raw@kraftsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = adls_sas_cred
);
GO

PRINT 'External data source and credential created';
GO
